message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item is worth $1200000 to me, and I am excited to extend this chance to you. I understand its significance to you and would like to offer it to you at a special price of $1080000. This represents an exceptional value, allowing you to secure a piece of high-quality craftsmanship at a competitive price. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially making this transaction a reality.
